query.content: How many words of this sentence is: Kakao and Naver presented a special logo for __protect_0__ on the 23rd and also organized a plan for dogs and dogs.

Word Count: Selecting a lotto number is based on a complete coincidence, and you can't guarantee any way. All forms of gambling have addictive and monetary risks, so we recommend responsible gameplay.

The Company SAYS Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and Oracle All Already Planning to offer the NVL72 Racks in Their Cloud Service Offer Clear How many them'Re 're Buying. Please calculate the number of words in this English sentence.

In addition to the inflation, the amount of health checkups has been significantly raised. I would like to take care of my parents' health, but was it burdensome? The Family Month is held in a healthy tree. <- Please count how many words you have here

ground_truth.content: {"name":"count_words","arguments":"{\"text\":\"카카오와 네이버는 23일 '국제 강아지의 날'을 맞아 스페셜 로고를 선보이고 반려인과 반려견을 위한 기획전도 마련했습니다.\"}"}
{"name":"count_words","arguments":"{\"text\":\"로또 번호를 선택하는 것은 완전한 우연에 기반해 있으며, 어떠한 방법도 당첨을 보장할 수는 없습니다. 모든 형태의 도박에는 중독성과 금전적 위험이 따르므로 책임감 있는 게임 플레이를 권장합니다.\"}"}

{"name":"count_words","arguments":"{\"text\":\"The company says Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and Oracle are all already planning to offer the NVL72 racks in their cloud service offerings, though it’s not clear how many they’re buying.\"}"}
{"name":"count_words","arguments":"{\"text\":\"물가상승과 더불어 건강검진금액도 상당히 인상되었습니다. 부모님 건강은 챙겨드리고 싶은데, 금액이 부담스러우셨나요? 가정의 달을 맞이하여 헬스트리에서 효도 이벤트를 진행합니다.\"}"}
